hadiths.text: Abbad bin Tamim narrated from his uncle:"The Messenger of Allah went out with the people to seek rain. So he led them in prayer for two Rak'ah, reciting aloud in them, turning his upper wrap around, raising his hands, requesting rain, and facing the Qiblah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الاِسْتِسْقَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Salat Al-Istisqa (The Prayer To Request Rain)
